Posts.Title: petition the government to continue Kadcyla for breast cancer patients...

Posts.Content: Hi Lizgra, I saw on an earlier post that you are being treated at Oldham Christies and the Victoria unit for chemo ... I just wanted to say that today I have finished treatment at Oldham after having chemo and radiotherapy. Â The chemo nurses and radiologists are amazing and nothing is too much trouble for them ... good luck with all your treatment, you will be in very good hands x
